price: 88. Y dijo (Muhammad quejándose de su gente a Al-lah): “¡Señor!, este pueblo no cree (en la verdad)”.
arabic: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: waqīlihi yārabbi inna hāulāi qawmun lā yu'minūna
